user_question: Can you tell me about the most Earth-like exoplanet discovered and generate an image of what it might look like?
final_answer: The most Earth-like exoplanet discovered is Kepler-452b. It is located in the habitable zone of its star and has a similar size and orbit to Earth. Image of Kepler-452b generated. It is approximately 1,400 light-years away from Earth.
